sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Card, Image, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class MovieCard extends React.Component { state = { detailsActive: false } handleDetailsClick = () => { this.setState({ detailsActive: !this.state.detailsActive}) } render() { let { id, poster_path, original_title, release_date, overview, vote_average } = this.props.movie return ( {this.state.detailsActive ? {original_title} Release Date: {release_date} {overview} Rating: {vote_average} : null} {this.state.detailsActive ? : } ) } } export default MovieCard
